name: FORCELOCK
description:
Originally created: September 19th, 2021.

A three-level game made as a project for college, my very first videogame in Unity!

This is a sphere physics based game, in which you must reach the goal while traversing the level as quickly and with as many points as possible. 

You cannot gain speed in any manner in your direct control, the only way to accelerate is to go through one of the "Booster Pads" found in the levels, and even then, the increase to the force the player applies to the sphere will decrease back to normal. 
This is where the "FORCELOCKING" mechanic comes in; by picking up the tokens found throughout the level you gain energy; which can be used by holding the spacebar to "LOCK" the force applied to the sphere for as long as you have Energy.

There is a Respawn button in case you fall off, just click on it to Respawn, just make sure to click off the button when you respawn.
